name: Shoot-a-Can Jr.
description:
Shoot-a-Can Jr. is an action puzzler for the GMTK 2021 "Joined Together" theme.

Can you stack and jump your way through all 8 levels? Match 3-of-a-kind vertically to clear cans from the stack, but make sure you get your orders right or else you'll have a spill on your hands.

Join matching cans together to advance. Keep the soda supply chain flowing. Two genres joined into one chaotic arcade action puzzler.

Follow on Twitter for the jam postmortem and design discussion! https://twitter.com/jonah_srg
